pages.text: Claiming is a feature of HexMC used to protect your items and structures. You can access the claim menu through the normal map by pressing $(thing)M (default)$()

pages.title: your first claim
pages.text: To create your first claim follow the step from before to open the map then right click on it to select a chunk or hold right click and claim a drag to select a larger amount. From the context menu then select $(thing)Claim Selected$()
